titleStmt.title: The Iliads and Odysses of Homer translated out of Greek into English by Tho. Hobbes of Malmsbury ; with a large preface concerning the vertues of an heroick poem, written by the translator.
Works. English. 1677
titleStmt.author: Homer.
Hobbes, Thomas, 1588-1679.
Wallim, J. Life of Homer.

notesStmt.note: Contains engraved added t.p. before each part; each part has special t.p. and separate paging.
"Homer's Odysses" contains "The life of Homer, collected and written by J. Wallim" as prefatory material, following t.p.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
